channel.title: byte on 回风舞雪
channel.description: Recent content in byte on 回风舞雪

item.title: Hex byte string int coversion
item.description: Reference: https://docs.python.org/zh-cn/3/library/stdtypes.html https://docs.python.org/zh-cn/3/library/struct.html # Python Types Coversion hey, there are some usefull features below, I will update at intervals: bit_length() New in version 3.1: In [73]: n = -37 In [74]: bin(n) Out[74]: '-0b100101' In [75]: n.bit_length() Out[75]: 6 hex to int: In [59]: int('0x22357', 16) Out[59]: 140119 int to hex: In [32]: hex(141128) Out[32]: '0x22748' packed binary data to int: In [70]: struct.unpack("I", b'\x57\x23\x02\x00') Out[70]: (140119,) In [71]: type(struct.unpack("I", b'\x57\x23\x02\x00')) Out[71]: tuple In [72]: struct.unpack("I", b'\x57\x23\x02\x00')[0] Out[72]: 140119 what is param “I”? Read More about struct int to packed binary data:
